mapper.select: select * from user where 1=1 and user_name = #{userName} and password = #{password}

select menu.text, menu.url, menu.parent_menu_id, menu.menu_id, menu.menu_code from menu inner join role_menu on role_menu.menu_id=menu.menu_id inner join role on role.role_id = role_menu.role_id inner join user_role on user_role.role_id = role.role_id inner join user on user.user_id = user_role.user_id where 1=1 and user.user_id = #{userId}
